statement: Projection after deviation differs from deviation after projection: \[δ,Φ\] ≠ 0 in general.
proof\_outline: 1. Apply deviation then projection on an arbitrary Box.
2. Apply projection then deviation on the same Box.
3. Show that the two results differ unless the Box state is invariant.

meta\_operator\_usage.notes: Core statement concerns non-commutation of δ and Φ.
